title: Food delivery platforms see 18 per cent jump in orders to 6.5-mn on New Year's Eve 2023: Report
description: 6.5 million orders, marking an 18% year-on-year growth, according to a report by Redseer. The surge was observed across metros, tier-1 cities, and other Indian cities, indicating a nationwide trend. The peak in orders occurred during dinners and late-night orders, with the gross merchant value reaching 2.5-3 times that of other days.
